  • Perceptron [1]

  • Recurrent Neural Networks [4]

  • Hopfiled Network [7]

References

[1] F. ROSENBLATT (1958). THE PERCEPTRON: A PROBABILISTIC MODEL FORINFORMATION STORAGE AND ORGANIZATION IN THE BRAIN. https://www.ling.upenn.edu/courses/cogs501/Rosenblatt1958.pdf.
[2] http://yann.lecun.com/exdb/lenet/.
[3] Yann LeCun (1998). Gradient-Based Learning Applied to Document Recognition. http://yann.lecun.com/exdb/publis/pdf/lecun-98.pdf.
[4] Jeffrey L. Elman (1990). Finding Structure in Time. https://crl.ucsd.edu/~elman/Papers/fsit.pdf.
[5] Sepp Hochreiter and Jurgen Schimidhuber (1997). Long Short-Term Memory. https://www.bioinf.jku.at/publications/older/2604.pdf.
[6] https://arxiv.org/pdf/1412.3555v1.pdf.
[7] https://bi.snu.ac.kr/Courses/g-ai09-2/hopfield82.pdf.
[8] https://papers.cnl.salk.edu/PDFs/Learning%20and%20Relearning%20in%20Boltzmann%20Machines%201986-3239.pdf.
[9] http://proceedings.mlr.press/v5/salakhutdinov09a/salakhutdinov09a.pdf.
[10] https://papers.nips.cc/paper/2006/file/5da713a690c067105aeb2fae32403405-Paper.pdf.
